# George H. Edwards

| death_place    =
| party          =  Republican
}}
George H. Edwards (May 25, 1860 - December 28, 1941) was Mayor of Kansas City, Missouri, from 1916 to 1918.
Biography
Edwards was born on May 25, 1860, in St. Louis, Missouri and moved to Kansas City in 1888, first living at 609 Brooklyn Avenue and then 3533 Harrison Boulevard while mayor.[http://www.kclibrary.org/localhistory/media.cfm?mediaID=110231 Local History - Kansas City Public Library]
He was the secretary and manager of Edwards & Sloane Jewelry.
